title: Natural Supplements - Best Vitamins Store - Bella All Natural

First I purchased the Detox and it worked, then I seen the skinny ice coffee and ordered one to give it a try. As soon as I received it I tried it and it actually tasted good and worked. I didn't find myself craving things and eating so much. I then wanted to try the strawberry lemonade, which is also delicious. Because I didn't want to run out of any of this product, I then placed an order for the mix or match bundle of 3. And I'm now waiting on my other order of 3 additional ice coffees. I have shared with some of my co-workers and we're thrilled of the effects. I can't wait until they have the collagen and chocolate shake to be in stock.
